Headline: #51 51st Temporary Reroute at 51st/Paulina
ShortDescription: 51 51st  buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Damen, 55th, Ashland and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#51 51st  buses are temporarily rerouted via 51st, Damen, 55th, Ashland and 51st: due to, street blockage near 51st/Paulina.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Indiana/14th
ShortDescription: Eastbound 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Michigan, 18th, Indiana and 15th: due to, street blockage near Indiana/14th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Michigan, 18th, Indiana and 15th: due to, street blockage near Indiana/14th.
